thread.title: BRIEF-LP Insurance Services Agrees To Acquire Assets Of Loan Protector Insurance Services

title: BRIEF-LP Insurance Services Agrees To Acquire Assets Of Loan Protector Insurance Services

organizations.name: brief-lp insurance services agrees to acquire assets of loan protector insurance services
brief-lp insurance services agrees to acquire assets of loan protect

text:
38 PM / Updated 12 minutes ago BRIEF-LP Insurance Services Agrees To Acquire Assets Of Loan Protector Insurance Services Reuters Staff 
Jan 8 (Reuters) - Loan Protector: 
* LP INSURANCE SERVICES HAS AGREED TO ACQUIRE THE ASSETS OF LOAN PROTECTOR INSURANCE SERVICES 
* LOAN PROTECTOR SAYS FOLLOWING TRANSACTION, DENNIS SWIT WILL NOW SERVE AS CEO OF CO AND CO WILL CONTINUE TO OPERATE UNDER LOAN PROTECTOR BRAND Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
